hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BackuptoRestore
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Please refer link https://github.com/yogeshbha/hello-world for the backups available and select the desired version

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
rm -rf /tmp/gitrepo mkdir /tmp/gitrepo GITDIR="/tmp/gitrepo"
RestoreDIR=$BackuptoRestore
cd $GITDIR rm -rf * echo "Cloning the repository"
git clone git@github.com:yogeshbha/hello-world.git
cd hello-world
echo "Stopping the Jenkins before restoring"
cd /var/lib/jenkins
BACKUPDIR=$(ls -t $GITDIR/hello-world | head -1 ) echo "Restoring the backup from $RestoreDIR"
cd $GITDIR/hello-world/$RestoreDIR cp -r * /var/lib/jenkins/. echo "Following are restored contents onf Jenkins" sleep 2
ls -lart /var/lib/jenkins/.
echo "Restoration completed, please check the health"
